website_summaries.verdict: A solid rice cooker with six functions for cooking and a large capacity.
pros: Can handle 7 cups of uncooked food to produce 14 cups cooked
Can also handle hot cereal, like oatmeal
Comes with a steamer basket for vegetables
Includes the ability to simmer food
cons: The cooker can have a tendency to brown the rice on the bottom if it is left too long

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 Hamilton beach rice cookers and they work great. I make rice pilaf and many different recipes, no issues. Make sure when cooking brown rice to put in only 1.5 cups of water per cup of rice not 2 cups so that the rice is fluffy!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Totally met my needs and steams wonderful vegetarian meals. Throw the veggies in the tray whil you cook rice underneath. Just try to keep the rice under 8 cups if you use steamer tray because rice rises into steamer tray while cooking. It's no issue really because it all goes in the same hole. Clean up was simple and saves on bills not needing to run dishwasher for pots and pans. Steamed meals can also easily wash off plates and bowels without scrubbing that further reduce need for running dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good depth to it
customer_reviews.text: Good depth to it. Can make up to 7 cups of rice. It doesn't have a rinse free option unfortunately, so you'll have to wash the rice grains if you want to cut down on the starch build up inside. But overall a pretty good affordable rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Easy to use. Great tasting rice! it might take a few different cooking variations to get the perfect rice. Don't take any instruction at face value. Do some research and try a few methods and eventually you will get perfect rice every time! Note: ALWAYS fluff right after the cooking is finished and let sit for a few minutes. This will eliminate that soggy rice blob result that some complained happens.
customer_reviews.author: Loz

customer_reviews.title: Cooks even brown rice
customer_reviews.text: This is the first rice cooker that I've found that cooks brown and wild rice.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love the Extras
customer_reviews.text: We make rice in this the least once a week and the most 4 times a week. The rice cooker manages all types of rices and adjusts cooking time as needed. I love to see the count down for when rice will finish and the count up when it is finished it tells you how long it has been warming. I am a pretty big stickler on having soft, but not too wet of rice, and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply built pot
customer_reviews.text: This pot is not a great deal. I bought it and in about a year, it just stopped working even though I took very good care of it. I'm the only user, but it just stopped working. My sisters have had other brands for several years now, and their pots still work vrry efficiently. Hamilton Beach did not build this pot well. Dont purchase it. I will stay far from this pot.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Best Rice Cooker Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Works AWESOME. Our family is not always able to eat at the same time. This rice cooker will keep the rice warm and perfect for 12 hours. We LOVE using this cooker. The rice stays moist and never dries out. The veggies can sit above the rice in the veggie tray keeping them warm too. We're totally happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this new addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this new addition to my kitchen. The only thing that frustrated me at first was the measurement charts... the measurements regarding the fill line didn't quite match up with the numbered lines in the actual cooker, but it's something anyone with common sense can figure out/translate. I'd recommend this product to friends (have done so twice already!)
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: excellent rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described, excellent rice cooker, and so well priced. I've cooked several kinds of rice so far, haven't tried hot cereal yet. I doubt I'll use it to steam vegetables but that could be a useful option.
customer_reviews.author: msg

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend was very happy when she received it as a Christmas gift from ...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend was very happy when she received it as a Christmas gift from me! She has used it several times, both for rice and for steamed veggies, and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thrash

customer_reviews.title: Really works well for simple meals
customer_reviews.text: I really think this works well, great value for the price, I'll see if it lasts longterm
customer_reviews.author: DLG

customer_reviews.title: good kitchen gadget to have
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my 12 year old rice cooker that finally bit the dust. I have yet to use any of the fancier settings but makes white rice perfectly every time like a rice cooker should. It does take about 2x longer than my older/smaller rice cooker though. The steam basket is a nice add-on and works well too. Otherwise it's pretty much your standard rice cooker technology.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful life saver for a porridge hunter who can't get up early in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: chloe

customer_reviews.title: best thing I ever invested in.
customer_reviews.text: I really really really like this appliance, it has made my life so much easier. BEWARE that it takes more time than you would take in a pressure cooker or a saucepan, but since I don't have to supervise this and can set my dinner in the morning before I leave for office - I. DON'T. CARE. Washing the parts is a pain in the ass but small price to pay really if you look at the whole picture.
customer_reviews.author: AVI

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker works. The only thing I don't like is that the black cover is attached to the unit. I would prefer a separate top that I can clean easily. That's what I had with my old rice cooker. But, this may not be a problem for anyone else. The interior pot (that actually cooks the rice) does come out for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: ILANA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We cook rice almost daily. This rice cooker is so easy to clean because it has a part you can pop off the lid to wash. There is even a part that collects water when you open the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: this inner pot's non-stick coating quality is so much better. I used to have Aroma's rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: this inner pot's non-stick coating quality is so much better. I used to have Aroma's rice cooker, and I was tired of seeing Aroma's inner pot coating peeling. won't buy Aroma again.
customer_reviews.author: Ycarol

customer_reviews.title: Not good for rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for rice cooker, but warmer works for 12 hours only after rice is cook. Not good as a rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Ceylon

customer_reviews.title: Great for large or small
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bigger rice cooker for the holiday parties that I volunteered for. Cooking for 70 is not easy however this made is easier for me to cook 10(uncooked) cups of rice at a time. I love that it always take only 45 minutes to cook. The con would be the bottom does burn a little is left too long on warm.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Farinas

customer_reviews.title: I really love this rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I really love this rice cooker! The various options make it easier to cook different, longer cooking rices like brown rice and wild rice, as well as different grains like quinoa.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B.

customer_reviews.title: Now that I have used it a few times it ...
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have used it a few times it has begun to sputter oatmeal water or rice water or whatever juice from whatever I'm cooking all over my countertop. Look around to see what else is for sale and pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked it and it cooks fast!
customer_reviews.text: Fast rice cooker. Put 3 cups of rice 3 cups of water depends how much you want to make. Salt and flavor. Close it and turn on for 35 min it will cook your rice perfect!
customer_reviews.author: s*u*m*

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice every time
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Making great rice every time. Its a little weird that you let it count up to 15 even once it's done. Would be smarter to have a count down timer. But it still gets the job done very well.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: For a family of four, this is a big rice cooker. However, we usually make extra so that we have rice for soups or other meals in the week. It frees up stove space. I will say that it needs attention as the rice cooks so as not to overcook; I know from other purchasers there are products that let you set the cooker and go. I have not felt that I could do that with this particular cooker as it just keeps going and going. However, the finished product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JacqiMartling

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well and makes perfect rice every time. Simple to use, has a good timer to tell you when it will be finished. Keeps rice warm after cooking. I like easy and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: tomkruger2000

customer_reviews.title: great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate and has a convenient delayed start option. We use it primarily to cook brown rice, it leave the rice very moist and fluffy but takes about 45 minutes to one hour to cook one cup of rice. I realize that brown rice takes longer to cook, but it just seems like a long time. But we just put on the rice way in advance of needing it and it stays warm. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Monishops1

customer_reviews.title: Works Great but Big
customer_reviews.text: It does a consistently good job cooking rice. It is a lot bigger than I expected though. It is not great for making 2-3 servings. The minimum size is more like 5-7 servings for us. It also takes quite a while but with very good results. If you don't want small batches and you care more about quality than time then I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rant

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: I like this rice cooker a lot. However, one feature I wish it had would be to tell us how much longer until the rice is ready. Sometimes I forget what time I put the rice on so I can't figure out if I need to start another start dish so they both come out at the same time. Maybe no other rice cooker does this but I wish they did.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We noticed a huge difference in the quality of the cooked rice. It was more fluffy and evenly cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Nispiros

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: the rice never seems to ever cook, always mushy. Yet still manages to burn on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: LBShares

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker! Perfect rice every time and an abundance of delicious online recipes.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker works exactly as I had hoped. I've made brown rice, quinoa, and wild rice in it several times so far and each has turned out perfectly. I won't hesitate to cook other while grains in it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for years now! Everything from Steaming to Rice Cooking! I cook with it multiple times a week
customer_reviews.author: Zbassdude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time, well worth the purchase. I never knew how much I'd use the steamer! Overall super easy to use and very convenient. I can finally cook well rounded meals (I'm new to cooking). Very easy to clean, looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Kernel Panic

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This thing is fast! We put veggies ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This thing is fast! We put veggies and rice and it's still ready faster than the entree'! It's smaller than we thought, we were pleasantly surprised about the size and still makes enough for a family meal.
customer_reviews.author: Doty

customer_reviews.title: Not What I had Hoped
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but I am not getting the results I had hoped to get. Maybe I need to learn more about how to use it well. I make much better rice in a regular pan.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Makes great rice. Received top marks from The Wirecutter/SweatHome
customer_reviews.text: Makes great rice. Received top marks from The Wirecutter/SweatHome. I agree.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great, the only complain I have is the cable length. It is short so when I plug it in, it has to stay close to the wall. If you don't have anything above that's not an issue. My previous rice cooker had a longer cable. Otherwise the cooker works well.
customer_reviews.author: Viva Perez

customer_reviews.title: More than pleased!
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for my grandson to use and he loves it - he is 20 and enjoys rice - it is SO easy and perfect results each time - we haven't made use of the steamer yet but know it will be of equal success - the extra benefit of this is that it has a "keep warm" at the end of the cooking cycle - works great - very pleased
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA SINGLETON

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.. I live at high altitude and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome.. I live at high altitude and it's impossible to cook rice in a pot. ...this bad-boy makes perfect rice every time.. And I've even started eating steamed broccoli. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Volk

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if it came with a plastic pot cover
customer_reviews.text: Works well! No complaints, except a little smaller than I thought. Would be nice if it came with a plastic pot cover, so leftover rice could be easily stored in the fridge, right in the removable cooking pot.
customer_reviews.author: nyadventuregirl

customer_reviews.title: I've tried many different types of grains and they always turn out perfect! The only downside is the quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been impressed with how many different settings this one has, I've tried many different types of grains and they always turn out perfect! The only downside is the quality of the insert bowl used to cook the rice, it became dis colored on the first wash. All of the other parts are good quality and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, estimates a lot longer than really takes at ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, estimates a lot longer than really takes at start, then drops fast, but as you get to know it and the rice you can estimate accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks rice quickly and fluffy. Rice does burn a ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooks rice quickly and fluffy. Rice does burn a bit on the bottom though. I've tried Pam and turning it off as soon as it's done to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: MEA

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker! It's a little annoying to remember to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cooker! It's a little annoying to remember to empty the litter condensation catcher section (it gets gross if you don't) but otherwise I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Lee Olivares

customer_reviews.title: We use this all the time! I’ve only burned ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time! I’ve only burned the rice once but I think I should’ve added more water. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Jernejcic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rice, even in large quantities, every time.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Everything about this rice steamer is perfect... the rice comes out awesome every time as long as you follow the instruction based on the amount you want. comes with stirrer/scooper. Cons: It's a little loud with the beeps when alerting you that it's finished.
customer_reviews.author: TSus

customer_reviews.title: Really useful small kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: Really useful small kitchen appliance. I like the different modes to cook brown and white rice, as well as steam vegetables. Performs really well.
customer_reviews.author: recluse

customer_reviews.title: and this is perfect size since it's just me now
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old one that was 11 years old, and this is perfect size since it's just me now.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Thiemke

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Cheap feeling plastic and the countdown timer always starts way overestimated, but it works just fine for white rice.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: H.B. Digital Simplicity deluxe Rice Cooker/Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Another birthday gift and they absolutely loved it. They have not used it as a steamer, but as a rice cooker, the rice was wonderfully delicious! Great product and highly recommended! Thank you! P.S. a rice spoon and paddle came with it which was a major bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this to make white rice.It works just as great as the rice cooker my husband and i purchased in Okinawa 10 yrs ago.When that one finally wore out i read the reviews about this one and purchased it.Over all it has been a gresat little rice cooker : )
customer_reviews.author: starladarcy

customer_reviews.title: get this rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Simple and very easy to use it does more than just cook rice. it can steam corn and beans even more it will keep your food warm after cooking it. Yes there is an instruction manual but it is a stand alone cooker and very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: NotFromAJedi

customer_reviews.title: this is a good one.
customer_reviews.text: Not all rice cookers are equal, this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, this is a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rice cooker to replace one that did not perform well. So far, this rice cooker performs as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Newberry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice every time.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice every time. A little hard to clean, but I haven't had another rice cooker so I can't compare it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: i love this thing it make no mess and is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Package came well protected, i love this thing it make no mess and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best rice cooker I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best rice cooker I have ever used. I make a few cups of rice for dinner, then save the rest and make delicious fried rice the next day. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great features to shortcut meals...steam or cook veggies and rice...
customer_reviews.author: jlatronica

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice Cooker for a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I have freshly cooked brown rice in it right now! This thing has performed admirably. The kids bent the container that holds the rice but I just bent it right back into shape and it keeps on working. It collects the condensed water that would spill or make a mess in a less well designed rice cooker. The timer feature works nicely. Obviously you can buy fancier rice cookers. I bet some of them even work better. This rice cooker matched very well with my family's commitment to rice and a budget, however.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceWeepul

customer_reviews.title: Both white and whole grain are done well. Hard to figure out timing for veg tray.
customer_reviews.text: Both white and whole grain are done well. Hard to figure out timing for veg tray.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: Never had a rice cooker before
customer_reviews.text: Love it ... love it ... I was always burning rice , It makes it perfect every time
customer_reviews.author: Tony Sal

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It cooks rice perfectly and using the steamer is great. We did jasmine rice and some salmon the first try and it was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: AmnesiacAZ

customer_reviews.title: This cooker is too easy for a busy lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Trust the reviews. This cooker is too easy for a busy lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: V. Miyagi

customer_reviews.title: I am going back to making rice in the kettle ...
customer_reviews.text: I am going back to making rice in the kettle. The cord is short so the steam goes on my cupboards and it overflows when putting a large amount of rice in. OK for small amounts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This rice maker is the best. Works perfectly. Just follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice Cooker for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rice cooker. Rice always comes out perfect. Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kindlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and price
customer_reviews.text: This item is cheaper to buy than a storefront like Bed,bath & Beyond, Target or Walmart. The features are easy to use. I was expecting an Aluminum internal layer, instead of non-stick since it has cancerous materials when it starts peeling off. However, it works well. I do prefer Aluminum just to avoid any issues down the line. The product itself is very simple to use, 1-touch button and just leave it. It did have a weird strong plastic smell the first few times of using it, maybe from factory materials. After a while, it wears off.
customer_reviews.author: ELECTRONICS CAGE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy and convient. Great value as well. Best of ask, no mess.
customer_reviews.author: TaeJohnDo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker works well. The rice cooks up fluffy & cleaning of the cooker is easy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A. Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Easy rice every time.
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is everthing i wanted and needed. Hassle free to make rice and also makes fantastic rice each time since there's self-regulation for heat. The insides are easy to clean too. You don't have to 'scrape off' cooled rice, since a gentle push is enough for it to come off. If it isn't, toss water and detergent into the detached(you can lift the part where you cook the rice out) cooking pot and leave it overnight. It'll definitely come off. Only complaint: The cord is short. Like slightly more than 1/2 an arm's length. Nothing an extension cord can't cover though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Its my first rice cooker but it does it well and very simple to use. Couldnt be happier.
customer_reviews.author: llamas

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and easy to use. Trial & error shows it usually requires less water than instructions recommend - hence four stars.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goodridge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice every time!
customer_reviews.text: We love ours so much we gave them as Christmas gifts last year. Highly recommended to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: John Adams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price but not as good as the Japanese one, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A-1 rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Did not disappoint one bit. The kids love rice cooked with this.
customer_reviews.author: John Andrew Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Have been using this rice cooker for almost a year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rice cooker in June 2016. Been using it to cook white jasmine rice about 3 times/week and have not encountered any issues/product defects. I'm satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natch

customer_reviews.title: Best rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Arrived in promised timeline. Perfect for large rice dishes/family sized meals.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Makes awesome oatmeal too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice cooker for making overnight steel cut oatmeal too! The delay feature is a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsay D.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful family gadget
customer_reviews.text: The recipient is currently enjoying this rice cooker. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P. Cansicio

customer_reviews.title: Item better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Item better than expected. Perfect rice and easy cleanup. A rice paddle was included with the cooker. Very happy with the rice cooker..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Price was half that of big box retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Crash 811

customer_reviews.title: This thing has worked great. Took some time to get used to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has worked great. Took some time to get used to the way it cooks vurses the instructions on the rice/grain bags but over all I'm glad I purchased it. I turned vegetarian a month before I bought it and found I needed something that would prepare hearty, long cooking grains without me having to watch over the pot. Cleans easily. As a bonus, the steam that comes out of the top helped to keep the house moist in the winter months. I would sit it on the open counter to cook so the steam could go to the living room...don't know if it actually helped but beat having a simmering pot on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal and I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal and I use it all the time. Not just for rice but this works great for steaming veggies. Since I bought it, I find myself cooking more fresh vegetables and was surprised that the family likes fresh and steamed better than boiled or caned. It does a great job with rice but you do have to watch it because cooking times aren't what presets think they should be but I still give it 5 stars because the rice sure tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: BigD1967

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Kitchen workhorse. Smallish size if counter space is at a premium.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I'm awful at making rice in a pot, and this has saved me lots of time and effort. Perfect rice every time. Just be sure you don't mix processed rice with whole grain, as they should be cooked separately on their respective settings. Mixing in one cook session will net you either mushy white rice or crunchy whole grain. Still, that's user error and not a problem with the rice cooker. They have different settings for a reason, and each setting works great with its intended rice types. Have started experimenting with other uses for it recently. I use it to steam (instead of boil) my eggs, and am exploring the world of steamed vegetables
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Tried all sorts of rice including Brown rice, Vegetables & Its good.So far its been almost 1 year & NO issues!
customer_reviews.author: Suresh Kollipara

customer_reviews.title: SWEET
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition, no overflow problem and really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: The Rons

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter for a Christmas gift. She was so excited. She said it has all the bells and whistles that she wanted. She uses it all the time. Not to big perfect for her family size of three keeping in mind of having leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Lola M Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great and works for us having seven in the family
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love this because its a rice cooker and a steamer in one! Works great and haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this rice cooker. Only giving it 4 stars because sometimes the rice is a little dry.
customer_reviews.author: mak

customer_reviews.title: cannot get good rice
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get my rice to come out in this machine. It looks nice. It's a good brand, but I'll be darned if I can get a good product out of it. The portiions are out of sinc. I don't know if its because I live in the high desert or not??? Gotta give it two thumbs down and for all of the good/great reviews I read before I purchased this, I can only say...Ya wanna buy mine?
customer_reviews.author: Judy C

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: It cooks rice very well and can double as a slow cooker. The timing feature is very usefully, especially for me where evenings are the craziest time of day. It received four stars, because cleaning it is a little bit more of a nuisance. On the hinge is a clear liquid collector that you really should remember to pop off and clean--or let your spouse know it needs to be done if its there turn to clean up dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Duney

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter moved to Portland three years ago & left behind an amazing device-her rice cooker. When upon moving back to Florida she quickly reclaimed this said device & so we had to go out and get our own-since I can't seem to live without one after using hers for so many years. So when I found this one I was a little skeptical because of how inexpensive it is..but I am pleased with my purchase-so much! We used it last night to steam broccoli, which it did a perfect job doing.
customer_reviews.author: Lela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker gives options for cooking different varieties
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker gives options for cooking different varieties. Rice is fluffy and delicious no complaints from our rice loving family. Unit is easy to clean and large display let's you know the cook time remaining which is a handy improvement over our older model.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, will definitely refer it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, have only cooked white rice. Perfect size, cleans up easy, love the countdown timer.

customer_reviews.title: It make great rice and steel cut oats
customer_reviews.text: Only rice cooker I have had. It make great rice and steel cut oats.
customer_reviews.author: kd

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Rice & Hot Cereal Cooker, 7-Cups uncooked resulting in 14-Cups (Cooked), 37549
product_meta.description: Size:14 cupHamilton beach rice cookers make mounds of delicious, fluffy rice with minimal effort. These popular appliances cook rice to the perfect moistness and texture, then shift to keep rice warm until serving time. These rice cookers are perfect for any family that enjoys cuisines from around the world. Versatile and easy to use, Hamilton beach rice cookers do more than just cook rice--use them to steam at the same time or cook beans, whole grains, mac and cheese, or any pasta/rice mix. These powerful rice cookers are also easy to clean, including nonstick bowls and glass lids you can put in the dishwasher.
feature_bullets: Expand your menu with perfectly cooked dishes
Select cooking function and it does the rest
Great for rice, beans, whole grains and flavored pasta & rice mixes
